definitions: An archaic or poetic contraction of 'ever', meaning at any time.
An archaic or poetic contraction of 'ever', meaning always or continually.
examples: Haply I think on thee, and then my state, like to the lark at break of day arising from sullen earth, sings hymns at heaven's gate; for thy sweet love remembered such wealth brings that then I scorn to change my state with kings.
